top.title: EU agrees €90bn loan for Ukraine but without using Russian assets
top.summary: Ukraine had wanted the EU to use €200 billion of frozen Russian assets but Belgium opposed the move.

top.title: Brown University shooting suspect found dead, police say
top.summary: The suspect ‍in ​last week's ‌mass shooting at Brown University has also been linked by police to the murder of an MIT professor on Monday.

top.title: Australia announces gun buyback scheme in wake of Bondi attack
top.summary: It is the largest scheme since the Port Arthur massacre in 1996, which prompted massive gun law reform.

top.title: TikTok owner signs agreements to avoid US ban
top.summary: The deals would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations.

top.title: UK to ban deepfake AI 'nudification' apps
top.summary: A new offence looks to build on existing rules outlawing sexually explicit deepfakes and intimate image abuse.

top.title: £100 contactless card limit to be lifted
top.summary: Card providers can decide whether to offer unlimited payments on contactless cards.

title.#text: TikTok ban: all the news on the app’s shutdown and return in the US
The TikTok US sale is finally happening
Threads wants to be the app you can’t wait to open in the morning
